group_1.textLeft: First though...I need to apologize.
It's just, Nagitan... Oops, I mean...
I'm sorry. I can't get that nickname out@of my head.

group_1.textRight: Nagitan is fine. I like my nickname.

group_1.textLeft: Really?! Uh, okay then...Nagitan.
Well...I had heard a lot about you.
I thought you were a scary person.
I thought that if I was too friendly with@you, um...you might get mad at me.

group_1.textRight: Because of all that happened between@the east and west.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
But I shouldn't believe everything I hear@about someone before meeting them.
I didn't know you were so friendly.
I'm sorry I assumed things about you based@on rumors.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad you saw the real me, despite what@you may have heard.

group_1.textLeft: You're really kind, too.
To be honest, I went in there without@realizing it was a maid cafe.
So I was really nervous.
But now, I understand you were being@very considerate to me, Nagitan.

group_1.textRight: Considerate? Do you really think so?

group_1.textLeft: I do!
When I showed an interest in herbal tea,@you were helpful with suggestions.
And you tried to ease my anxiety by@offering to play a game.
I realized you were trying to make me more@comfortable being there.
I'm not used to cafes like that so I won't@be going again, but...
The experience wasn't unpleasant thanks@to you.

group_1.textRight: I was only doing my job.
None of that was actually my intention.

group_1.textLeft: Really?
Either way, I was still happy.
Even if it wasn't what you meant to do,@it felt like you were doing it for me.
It was like you were being considerate of@how I felt.

group_1.textRight: (In other words, thinking about what the@other person wants and responding to it.)
([chara:101601:cheek_0][chara:101601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]That's what the manager was getting at.)
(It was my duty to always keep that in@mind.)

group_1.textLeft: You may not be like the other maids,@Nagitan.
But I think you're good with customers.
Yes!
You're a natural at taking care of people.
So...keep up the good work!

group_1.textRight: I will do my best... Thanks for the help.
